attributes.action: Changes to rape laws in the UK
attributes.additional_details: In the UK it is predicted that every 1 in 5 people face sexual harassment in their lifetime. It’s increasing rapidly and we are all turning a blind eye. Women and men, young and old are being abused and we turn a blind eye? If you have any humanity or empathy in you please sign this petition and create a world where boys can no longer be boys and girls are never made to feel ashamed or have to face these vile human beings.
attributes.background: This is a petition to campaign towards better laws against rape where the victims cannot be blamed.  It is a campaign in order to gain laws where the victims are never called liars and only sexual history with the alleged offender can be used.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you'd like to see to the law on rape.
